meanings.definition: A plant sterol found in various foods and used as a dietary supplement.
meanings.sent1: The sitosterol in this supplement comes from plants.
meanings.sent2: Many people take sitosterol to improve their health.
meanings.sent3: The sitosterol in the salad dressing decided to go on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the benefits of sitosterol.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the benefits of sitosterol to his patient in detail.

meanings.definition: A compound that may help lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Sitosterol is known for its potential to reduce cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes sitosterol to maintain her heart health.
meanings.sent3: The sitosterol in the blood stream high-fived the good cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: The effect of sitosterol on cholesterol is like a superhero fighting off villains.
meanings.sent5: The importance of sitosterol in managing cholesterol cannot be overstated.
